Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Locate the sink in the bathroom.', '2. Fill the sink with water.', '3. Add soap to the water in
 the sink.']

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathroom: item where:
            is_bathroom(bathroom)
        # Select the bathroom

        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and inside(sink, bathroom)
        # Select a sink inside the bathroom

        achieve close_char(char, sink)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Locate the bathroom sink.', '2. Fill the sink with water.', '3. Add soap to the water to create
 soapy water.']

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathroom: item where:
            is_bathroom(bathroom)
        # Bind the bathroom to locate the sink inside it

        foreach sink: item:
            if is_sink(sink) and inside(sink, bathroom) and not visited(sink):
                # Check all sinks in the bathroom that havent been visited
                observe(sink, "Check if this is the bathroom sink")
                # Observe to see if the sink is the one you want

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Locate the bathroom sink.', '2. Fill the sink with water.', '3. Add soap to the water and mix u
ntil it is bubbly or soapy.']

behavior locate_bathroom_sink():
    body:
        bind bathroom: item where:
            is_bathroom(bathroom)
        # Select the bathroom

        foreach sink: item:
            if is_sink(sink) and inside(sink, bathroom) and not visited(sink):
                # Check all unvisited sinks inside the bathroom to find the bathroom sink
                observe(sink, "Check if this is the bathroom sink")
                # Observe the sink to verify if it is the bathroom sink

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        locate_bathroom_sink()
        # Execute the behavior to locate the bathroom sink

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathroom_sink: item where:
            is_sink(bathroom_sink)
        # Choose a sink in the bathroom
        
        fill_sink_with_water(bathroom_sink)
        # Fill the bathroom sink with water
